name: Dumb Ways to Die: Wire Walk
name_original: Dumb Ways to Die: Wire Walk
description:
The dastardly penguin boss has made off with Loopy’s delicious treats!

Keep your balance and recover your stolen goodies. Watch out for aggressive penguin henchmen, musical bunyips, low flying planes and general electrocution problems… could get messy.

Don’t forget to collect meerkat companions to help you out!
